name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色すーぱーみらくる☆どり〜む♪【#湊あくあ3Dライブ 】 [gf7RSwmp8dM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Opening transition with title card and 'Please wait a moment' text.
Minato Aqua shouts the live concert title and starts the performance.
Performance of the song 'Baby Sweet Berry Love'.
MC section where Aqua talks to the audience and drinks 'invisible' water.

subtitles.original: しばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: Please wait a moment

subtitles.original: あくあ色スーパーミラクルドリーム
subtitles.english: Aqua Iro Super Miracle Dream

subtitles.original: あくあ色に染まれ！
subtitles.english: Dye it in Aqua's color!

subtitles.original: 君にBaby Sweet Berry Love
subtitles.english: To you, Baby Sweet Berry Love

subtitles.original: 大人な気持ちだけ
subtitles.english: Only adult feelings

subtitles.original: 分け合えたらいいのにな
subtitles.english: I wish we could share them

subtitles.original: 願いを叶えてよ
subtitles.english: Please make my wish come true

subtitles.original: See you Tiffany-cha Give me Give me Shiny-tan
subtitles.english: See you Tiffany-cha Give me Give me Shiny-tan

subtitles.original: P-R-E-T-T-Y Tiny Tiny Berry Love
subtitles.english: P-R-E-T-T-Y Tiny Tiny Berry Love

subtitles.original: 大好きなハートも
subtitles.english: Even my favorite heart

subtitles.original: ごめんねの涙も
subtitles.english: And even my sorry tears

subtitles.original: 本当は素直に見せたくて
subtitles.english: Honestly, I want to show them to you plainly

subtitles.original: 伝えたい想いと
subtitles.english: The feelings I want to convey

subtitles.original: 裏返しの態度
subtitles.english: And my contradictory attitude

subtitles.original: 上手になれない心模様
subtitles.english: My heart's patterns that I can't manage well

subtitles.original: どうして空回り 胸がギュッとなる
subtitles.english: Why am I spinning my wheels, my chest feels tight

subtitles.original: 近い距離がもどかしいよね
subtitles.english: Being this close is frustrating, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 届けたいな
subtitles.english: I want to reach you

subtitles.original: 君とBaby Sweet Berry Love 一人きりじゃなくて
subtitles.english: With you, Baby Sweet Berry Love, I'm not alone

subtitles.original: でもね まっすぐに見つめて 空色映したい
subtitles.english: But you know, look straight at me, I want to reflect the sky color

subtitles.original: もっとBaby Sweet Berry Love せめて君の前では
subtitles.english: More Baby Sweet Berry Love, at least in front of you

subtitles.original: 笑って 怒って 溢れた ありのままでいたい
subtitles.english: Laughing, getting angry, overflowing, I want to be as I am

subtitles.original: だからBaby Sweet Berry Love
subtitles.english: So, Baby Sweet Berry Love

subtitles.original: 一緒に始めよう
subtitles.english: Let's start together

subtitles.original: See you Tiffany-cha Give me Give me Shiny-tan
subtitles.english: See you Tiffany-cha Give me Give me Shiny-tan

subtitles.original: P-R-E-T-T-Y Tiny Tiny Berry Love
subtitles.english: P-R-E-T-T-Y Tiny Tiny Berry Love

subtitles.original: 閉じられたハートを
subtitles.english: My closed heart

subtitles.original: 探してみるけれど
subtitles.english: I try to search for it, but

subtitles.original: 本当は自分の一番奥にある
subtitles.english: In truth, it's deep inside myself

subtitles.original: まるで寂しげに
subtitles.english: Just like a lonely

subtitles.original: 澄ました迷い猫
subtitles.english: Clear-faced stray cat

subtitles.original: こぼれた夕日に嫉妬しちゃう
subtitles.english: I get jealous of the spilled sunset

subtitles.original: 不意な優しさに はしゃぐ胸の音
subtitles.english: The sound of my heart frolicking at unexpected kindness

subtitles.original: ドタバタとか カラフルでキュンと
subtitles.english: Clattering or colorful and heart-thumping

subtitles.original: 満ちていくの
subtitles.english: It's filling up

subtitles.original: 君とBaby Sweet Berry Love 矛盾だらけだけど
subtitles.english: With you, Baby Sweet Berry Love, it's full of contradictions, but

subtitles.original: 大事であればあるほど 誤魔化してしまうの
subtitles.english: The more important it is, the more I gloss it over

subtitles.original: だけどBaby Sweet Berry Love 自分の心まで
subtitles.english: But Baby Sweet Berry Love, even my own heart

subtitles.original: 分からない時は君と 確かめ合いたいな
subtitles.english: When I don't understand, I want to confirm it with you

subtitles.original: だからBaby Sweet Berry Love
subtitles.english: So, Baby Sweet Berry Love

subtitles.original: 同じ場所にいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be in the same place

subtitles.original: 君にBaby Sweet Berry Love 自分を守るように
subtitles.english: To you, Baby Sweet Berry Love, as if protecting myself

subtitles.original: 大切なことがあるの こんなに近くに
subtitles.english: There's something important, this close by

subtitles.original: 君とBaby Sweet Berry Love 一人きりじゃなくて
subtitles.english: With you, Baby Sweet Berry Love, I'm not alone

subtitles.original: でもね まっすぐに見つめて 空色映したい
subtitles.english: But you know, look straight at me, I want to reflect the sky color

subtitles.original: もっとBaby Sweet Berry Love せめて君の前では
subtitles.english: More Baby Sweet Berry Love, at least in front of you

subtitles.original: 笑って 怒って 溢れた ありのままでいたい
subtitles.english: Laughing, getting angry, overflowing, I want to be as I am

subtitles.original: だからBaby Sweet Berry Love
subtitles.english: So, Baby Sweet Berry Love

subtitles.original: こんなに好きだよ
subtitles.english: I love you this much

subtitles.original: See you Tiffany-cha Give me Give me Shiny-tan
subtitles.english: See you Tiffany-cha Give me Give me Shiny-tan

subtitles.original: P-R-E-T-T-Y Tiny Tiny Berry Love
subtitles.english: P-R-E-T-T-Y Tiny Tiny Berry Love

subtitles.original: ずっとBaby Sweet Berry Love
subtitles.english: Always Baby Sweet Berry Love

subtitles.original: はーい！ということで、
subtitles.english: Hi! So,

subtitles.original: ここまで駆け抜けてお届けしていますが、
subtitles.english: we've been running through this so far, but,

subtitles.original: えー、みんなね、ついてこれてますか？
subtitles.english: uh, everyone, are you keeping up?

subtitles.original: ついてこれてる？みんな！
subtitles.english: Are you keeping up? Everyone!

subtitles.original: ヤッホー！見えてるー？
subtitles.english: Yahoo! Can you see me?

subtitles.original: よいしょ、よいしょ。
subtitles.english: Heave-ho, heave-ho.

subtitles.original: あ、これはあの、素直な人にしか見えない、
subtitles.english: Oh, this is, um,

subtitles.original: あの、水です。飲めます。
subtitles.english: the water that only honest people can see. I can drink it.

subtitles.original: あー！
subtitles.english: Ah!
